tool_description: Access to 216,487 cities over the world by their coordinates. Enter latitude and longitude and get a list of closest cities from these coordinates.
name: World Cities
title: World Cities

api_list.name: Get all countries paginated
api_list.description: Get a paginated list of countries.

api_list.name: Get countries by region code
api_list.description: Get countries from a region. For example, get a paginated result for all countries in Europe.

api_list.name: Get countries by code
api_list.description: Get one country by its ISO2 code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-cities6.p.rapidapi.com/countries/code/FR"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-cities6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://world-cities6.p.rapidapi.com/countries/code/{countrycode}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-cities6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get countries by name
api_list.description: Get a country by its name. This is an autocomplete. This endpoint is ideal for search.

api_list.name: Get cities by coordinates
api_list.description: Returns closest cities from coordinates entered.

api_list.name: Get cities by name (Autocomplete)
api_list.description:
Returns cities from city name.
Cities that include the city name you are searching for.  This allows for autocomplete features. 
Results are paginated.

api_list.name: Get cities by id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-cities6.p.rapidapi.com/cities/id/2979783"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-cities6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://world-cities6.p.rapidapi.com/cities/id/{cityid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-cities6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get city by country code
api_list.description:
Returns paginated cities from a country code.
The country code must be an ISO2 format.

**Example: FR**
